DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare bioavailability CMX001 administer tablet v solution determine effect high-fat meal CMX001 bioavailability .
DOC.brief_title: Comparative Bioavailability Effect Food CMX001 Healthy Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Healthy male nonchildbearing female 1855 year old Use investigational drug and/or treatment within 30 day prior enrollment . Positive HIV , Hepatitis B Hepatitis C test result Tobacco user History GI disease disorder History positive fecal occult blood test ( FOBT ) Body Mass Index ( BMI ) > 30 < 18 , body weight < 50 kg Prior abdominal pelvic surgery
